tag_list: voice-blast, voice-broadcast, voice-broadcasting, voice-broadcast-services, voice-messages, voice-message-software, automated-dialer
overview:
VoiceBlast123.com is part of the growing family of services offered by IVR Technology Group (ITG). Since 1996, ITG has been an industry leader providing the best in class of Hosted Interactive Voice Response applications. We provide custom, made to order applications to both big and small enterprises. Through VoiceBlast123.com and MobileMarkering123.com we provide self service applications that allow customers of all sizes to set up, manage and control both their communications for their business.

We strive to provide the best personal services and look to provide help and support with all the steps of your applications - from start to finish. We can help you create your call flow, suggest scripting and provide reporting and data integration. We turn your ideas / needs into reality!

For more information on SMS/Texting, please visit www.mobilemarketing123.com. For information on all of our applications and services, be sure to visit www.ivrtechgroup.com.
